title: Haunted House Sound Pack
description: Haunted House Sound Effects Bundle brings complete spooky environmental sound effects and raw materials to your house!
longDescription: Haunted House Sound Effects Bundle brings complete spooky environmental sound effects and raw materials to your house! The Haunted House Sound Effects Bundle includes these sound effects; mud impact, tv white noise, electricity, door slams, dark atmosphere sounds, creepy forest ambiences, footsteps, spooky wind, demonic entity, ghost vox, and creaking sound effects! It’s Halloween, you should stay away from estate agents trying to sell you spooky houses for low prices! With Haunted House Sound Effects Bundle you have access to door sound effects, horror sound effects, wind sound effects, and designed sound effects that you need for your project. Our Haunted House Sound Effects Bundle will help you to create a dark and ominous atmosphere for your project. It’s the Spooky Season avoid strangers and eerie looking houses!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Audio Waves: 149

Number of Audio Cues: 149

Sample rate / bit rate: 24bit – 96kHz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 18 min 41 sec

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
